items.title: Freelance Architect, Developer, CTO
items.description: Provide freelance development, architecture, and fractional CTO services to business.

items.title: Co-Founder & CTO
items.description: Co-founded and served as CTO for a Colorado-based startup that delivered actionable, timely, and accurate information to BTB sales and marketing professionals.

items.title: Principal Architect
items.description: As the sixth employee, I served as the Principal Architect at this venture-backed startup delivering software to the payments industry.

items.title: M.S. Computer Information Systems - ABT
items.description: Completed all coursework with a 4.0 GPA, did not complete final project due to professional obligations.

items.title: B.A. Economics
items.description: Developed a strong foundation in logic and reasoning, behavioral science and financial and economic theory.
